item.title: Test
item.description: hugo test instrution abc 678 890 | | | | | :–: | —- | —- | | | | | | | | | | | | | ## hello Sfasfsafasf.abhaloodfefsfsafafsfasfaffasfasfaafaf package main import ( "github.com/urfave/cli" "fmt" ) func main() { app:=cli.NewApp() app.Name ="boom" app.Usage= "make an explosive entrance" app.Action=func(c *cli.Context) error { fmt.Println("boom I say") return nil } //app.Run(os.Args) world a b c helloworld
